attributes.action: Debate the new “Boris Deal” (without amendments or changes)
attributes.additional_details:
I wish the uncertainty of BREXIT over ASAP so confidence can improve and the economy grow

I believe it is best not to undermine democracy and ignore the referendum, or to ask the same question again. But get this over and done with as soon as possible

the UK is viewed as the "Mother of all Democracies", having asked the people, ignoring their vote would lose the prestige and reputation of the UK

The Deal that Boris Johnson negotiated is imperfect, but as good as we are going to get.
attributes.background: If you want Brexit done by the 31st October and have had enough of Parliamentary shenanigans sign this petition to show MP’s and the speaker the strength of feeling in this country.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/277458

You might like to know that Parliament has debated the Prime Minister's deal twice since it was negotiated with the EU. You can read the transcripts of the debates here:

https://hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2019-10-19/debates/48144FF8-0E08-455A-8175-1EB64918D29E/EuropeanUnion(Withdrawal)Acts

https://hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2019-10-22/debates/277C5A20-456D-469B-A415-D04AFFD83248/EuropeanUnion(WithdrawalAgreement)Bill
